DefaultProfilerMsgBuilder (Class)¶

Brief Description: Default implementation of the ProfilerMsgBuilder interface.

Detailed Description:

This class implements the ProfilerMsgBuilder interface to provide a default way of building profiling messages.

In file src/util/default_profiler_msg_builder.hh

build_msg (Advice)¶

See: ProfilerMsgBuilder::build_msg
